key_commands.description: List all pods in the namespace to identify failing components.

key_commands.command: exec_shell("kubectl describe pod rate-<POD_SUFFIX> -n test-hotel-reservation && kubectl logs rate-7bdc<POD_SUFFIX>test-hotel-reservation -<REPLICA_SUFFIX>")
key_commands.description: Inspect the failing rate pod details and retrieve previous container logs to understand crash/backoff behavior.
key_commands.original_command: exec_shell("kubectl describe pod rate-7bdc978679-xts2d -n test-hotel-reservation && kubectl logs rate-7bdc978679-xts2d -n test-hotel-reservation --previous")

key_commands.description: Fetch current logs from the rate service container showing SASL authentication failures against MongoDB.
Check MongoDB rate pod logs revealing 'UserNotFound' for admin, indicating missing admin user and root cause.

key_commands.command: exec_shell("kubectl get deploy rate -n test-hotel-reservation -o yaml")
key_commands.description: Review the rate deployment spec to understand its configuration and environment.
key_commands.original_command: exec_shell("kubectl get deploy rate -n test-hotel-reservation -o yaml")

key_commands.command: exec_shell("kubectl get deploy mongodb-rate -n test-hotel-reservation -o yaml")
key_commands.description: Review the MongoDB rate deployment to verify authentication and mounted ConfigMaps related to initialization/failure scripts.
key_commands.original_command: exec_shell("kubectl get deploy mongodb-rate -n test-hotel-reservation -o yaml")

key_commands.command: exec_shell("kubectl get configmap -n test-hotel-reservation mongo-rate-script -o yaml && kubectl get configmap -n test-hotel-reservation failure-admin-rate -o yaml")
key_commands.description: Inspect ConfigMaps to confirm scripts that create or remove the admin user, explaining the missing admin and auth errors.
key_commands.original_command: exec_shell("kubectl get configmap -n test-hotel-reservation mongo-rate-script -o yaml && kubectl get configmap -n test-hotel-reservation failure-admin-rate -o yaml")
